text: Hagi antahio, pristi vahetamine Livae vahetmimo'za kazahu'za Anumzamofo nona kigahaze. Hagi maka ruzahu ruzahu eri'zama eri antahizama eri'naza vahetmimo'za kaza hu'za ana eri'zana enerinagenka, maka eri'za vaheka'ane, zamagra zamavesite'ma eri'zama eri vahe'mo'za kagria keka'a antahi'za eri'zana erigahaze. Hagi maka ugagota kva vahe'mo'zane, maka vahe'mo'zanena ke'ma hanana kea antahi'za ana eri'zana erigahaze.
